text.section: A provision specifying the percentage of any loss or claim for which each company shall be liable.

A provision that any notice, sworn statement or proof of loss which may be required by the provisions of said policy may be rendered, made or given to any one of such companies or to a duly authorized agent of any one of such companies, and that such notice, sworn statement or proof of loss so rendered, made or given shall be valid and binding as to all of such companies.
The provisions numbered (3) and (5) in section one hundred and two A.
The provision, in the case of a policy issued by a mutual company, numbered (4) in said section one hundred and two A.
